Html:
I would like to use rcon.sendCommand("say XXXX");
the XXXX = some foreign character like Български,Français,한국어,繁體中文,简体中文
and in the game it would turn out to be display as "????????"...

How do i resolve this issue?

UTF8 support?

Many thanks!

Hi Poheart,
thank you for reporting it. source code has been updated.build the latest source code to get the UTF-8 supported version.

Thanks for fast reply!

Sadly it thrown exception to me when i use latest compiled one..


An unhandled exception of type 'System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException' occurred in mscorlib.dll

Additional information: Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection.
i think you have forgotten to increase to size which caused above error when typing non-English character which exceeded the limitation..

According to the documentation, the command should be an ASCII string.
Its been fixed in the latest version.
